reviews.text: We stayed at this motel September 1, 2012. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. We ate in the dining area and the food was delicious and priced about the same as anywhere else. On Sunday morning we enjoyed a breakfast buffet with omelets made to order. A shuttle was available that would take you to area restraunts and the mall. There was a full gym with updated equipment located near the pool area. I did notice a musty odor in that area, but the rest of the hotel smelled clean. The rooms appeared to be recently refurbished, beds were comfortable. The bedding and pillows were perfect. The only problem with the room was the air conditioner; it "clunked" when it started and shut off but it was such a minute issue that we didn't bother to complain to the front desk. Overall it was an enjoyable stay with an impressive staff and we would definately stay there again.
reviews.title: Would Stay Here Again

reviews.text: I stayed here for the weekend while doing some work in Iowa.
reviews.title: Affordable price with all the ammenities

reviews.text: Pros:
reviews.title: Great place for convention

reviews.text: * Great weekend rate <$110 a night
reviews.title: Smelly rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: * Typical full service Marriott room
reviews.title: So Impressed!!

reviews.text: My family has a reunion here every year. The rooms are newly decorated this year and look great. The new lobby is very modern and comfortable. As always, the front desk is very helpful. The Sunday breakfast buffett was very good and a good value. Enjoyed our stay.
reviews.title: We always enjoy this hotel

reviews.text: Stayed here 3 nights with a USTA tennis team for the sectionals tournament. Hotel has been remodeled since we stayed 2 years ago. Very nice decor, comfortable beds and bedding. Free wifi internet was very nice also. Was hoping to get a small refridgerator for our room, but none were available. Our room was right off the lobby, first floor - we were concerned about noise, but it was not an issue. The air conditioner in our room was very noisy - made it hard to sleep. A few things we were not happy with - they did not refill the coffee in our room - had to go looking for it and a lid for my cup. Tried calling the front desk from my phone - button didn't work. Went out in the lobby, and the front desk was not too helpful. Bartender was very helpful - had both a coffee packet and a lid. Also - they did not give us a new bar of soap after our first two nights - had to ask for that too. They also told us bagels would be available for purchase at 5:30am the next morning - and they were not there. We had a 6:30 am match to get to. As one of the host hotels for the tournament, they did not seem very accomodating. As far as a nice place to stay - very good for that. Excellent location and facilities.
reviews.title: Good for our group

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great stay overall. The hotel seemed to have gone through a recent renovation as the entire inside looked updated. The best part of the stay was the front desk staff and the bartender. We stayed last friday in case you would like to give them a pat on the back and tell them job well done. Thanks again for making our weekend stay a good one.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.text: My stay at this hotel was nice. The bed was comfortable. The wifi was free. They can make any Starbucks drink at the bar, which was convenient in the morning. Next time, I will order a grande size - I don't think they make the larger sizes a lot, so my drink came out about an inch short.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: The room was clean and well thought out for a business user (ie no hunt for outlets to plug in devices). As always seems to happen, I had one towel that was nice and fluffy but the second was ready to be sent to a Courtyard.
reviews.title: Terrific Spo

reviews.text: I stayed at the Marriott for a business meeting in early December and was surprised and pleased to see a lot of updates and new, modern touches. I have stayed at this property on and off for more than 10 years and was impressed with the new lobby, the bar and dining area. The staff were friendly and helpful and presented the always-high level of Marriott customer service. My room was spacious and nicely appointed. The heating unit was quiet, the bathroom was in good condition and I enjoyed my stay. The price seemed a bit high compared to other properties in the area but otherwise it was a very nice property.
reviews.title: Nice Update-Nice Property

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel one night on a cross country road trip (I-80). Positive was the ease of reservation (48hours prior to arrival), location of hotel (easy to spot from freeway, has large well lit parking lot), and service (very helpful at check-in and got quick/good room service although I ordered just as kitchen was closing). Also nice was the very good price for the room.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, great price, big problem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Now, the room itself was spacious, without imminent luxury, but with solid ammenities. Room had a stale smell upon entering (like nobody had been there in a long time), which imporved with turning on the AC fan, but when I turned up the heat the room filled with a smell of burned plastic, which also eventually cleared. All this would have been acceptable, except for the stain on the bed sheet, which was in a suspicous location, and indicating either unclean sheets or poor success with washing them. Decided not to change the room (had so little time to sleep).
reviews.title: Great Hotel in West Des Moines

reviews.text: My advice, if the stain doesn't come out the first time, throw away the sheet. The (appearance of) unclean bed sheets will doom the reputation of a hotel every time.
reviews.title: Ehhh....it was okay

reviews.text: If it wouldn't have been for that issue the experience would have been a good one.
reviews.title: Decent stay, decent value, nothing stands out

reviews.text: On May 15, 2012, I wrote a review for a recent stay at the Marriott, in West Des Moines. At the time I wrote this review, I also emailed the Marriott, West Des Moines. Within a few days, I received a telephone call from the hotel management. After a discussion about the problems I encountered during my stay, the hotel sent me a gift card good for a stay at a Marriott. We used this gift card this past weekend at a Marriott in Ankeny, IA and thoroughly enjoyed our stay and the accommodations.
reviews.title: Update to a previous review

reviews.text: Thank you Marriott.
reviews.title: Marriott WDM is a Great place to stay!

reviews.text: The hotel was in a very convenient spot. Very close to all freeways and it only took 20 min to get to my daughters apartment! It was very upscale and clean. Housekeeping did an excellent job! The gym was perfect, even had three machines that I already use, so it made for a great work-out :) Had one disappointment, but the front desk took care of it immediately :)
reviews.title: First time stay for Anniversary

reviews.text: We chose to stay here for our one year anniversary. There are a lot of restaurants and things to do in the area so it was a great choice. The checking in process was great and the room was extremely neat and clean. We had a jacuzzi suite which included a romance package, that unfortunately was non existing. We ordered it 2 hours ahead of time and after waiting 30 minutes after the requested time, I called to see what the holdup was. The clerk apologized and I assumed she would then have it sent up, still never received it all night. I was disappointed because this was a romantic weekend for our anniversary; not to mention we were paying for it. I addressed the issue with Ericka in the morning after a wonderful breakfast. She apologized and compensated us. All in all I would definately stay here again.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel--Close to Jordan Creek Mall

reviews.text: My family recently stayed at the Marriott West Des Moines. This hotel has been newly renovated. The room was very nice. There is a shuttle available to the mall for a small fee. There is a lobby bar and also a restaurant on the property. There was a charge for breakfast, which was our only disappointment.
reviews.title: Indifferent staff, great manager
